item.title: An October 2022 ‘Bharat Jodo Yatra’ video from Raichur is falsely shared as the first day of the 2025 ‘Voter Adhikar Yatra’ in Bihar
item.description: <![CDATA[On 17 August 2025, Congress leader and Leader of the Opposition in the Lok Sabha, Rahul Gandhi, launched the ‘Voter Adhikar Yatra’ in Sasaram, Bihar, a 16-day march covering over 1,300 km across more than 20 districts of the state. The march was launched against the backdrop of the Congress’s accusations of “vote chori” against the ECI and the INDIA Bloc’s opposition to the Election Commission’s Special Intensive Revision (SIR) in Bihar. The campaign will conclude with a rally at Gandhi Maidan i...]]>
item.author: Ananya Matta, Nitish Kumar Dhonge
